file.name: allOf-required.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Example
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: http://api.example.xyz/v1
paths:
  /person/display/{personId}:
    get:
      parameters:
        - name: personId
          in: path
          required: true
          description: The id of the person to retrieve
          schema:
            type: string
      operationId: list
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/clubForCreation"
components:
  schemas:
    clubForCreation:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/clubForUpdate'
      required:
        - name

    clubForUpdate:
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
        shortName:
          type: string
          maxLength: 255
